content:
衛生福利部民國107年7月20日 衛部秘字第1072161286號通知單註銷密等
中華 民國內政 部 MINISTRY OF INTERIOR REPUBLIC OF CHINA TAIWAN, CHINA
N1289
Ref. Fs-Reg (Huang,ct) TA (Chen, e)
6 February 1963
Dr. I. C. Fang Director WPRO/WHO Manila, P. I.
Dear Dr. Fang,
I wish to refer to your letter of 23 January 1963, reference China F/8 and F/19, concerning the formal letter of award for Mr. Eugene Chen and Dr. Chich-tao Huang.
I am happy to inform you that Dr. Huang is willing to take his second English test. His formal letter of award will be given to him after his satisfactory English test.
Concerning Mr. Eugene Chen, I regret to say that he has resigned from his government post. Dr. T. C. Hsu of PHA is going toiconsider another candidate to take his place under 1962 TA fellowship program.
Sincerely yours,
Bgd. C. K. Chang C. K. Chang, M.D. ,M.P.H. Director Department of Health Administration
cc : Dr. T. C. Hsu Dr. A. H. Penington
D (2)216 Academia Historica
14

中華 民國內政 部 MINISTRY OF INTERIOR REPUBLIC OF CHINA TAIWAN, CHINA
Dr. I. C. Fang Director WPRO/WHO Manila, P. I.
I wish to refer to your letter of 23 January 1963, reference China F/8 and F/19, concerning the formal letter of award for Mr. Eugene Chen and Dr. Chich-tao Huang.
I am happy to inform you that Dr. Huang is willing to take his second English test. His formal letter of award will be given to him after his satisfactory English test.

Concerning Mr. Eugene Chen, I regret to say that he has resigned from his government post. Dr. T. C. Hsu of PHA is going toiconsider another candidate to take his place under 1962 TA fellowship program.
Bgd. C. K. Chang C. K. Chang, M.D. ,M.P.H. Director Department of Health Administration
cc : Dr. T. C. Hsu Dr. A. H. Penington
